extension.license: MIT License

extension.summary: Resolve common live video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi + find links embeded in sites.
Livestreamer extracts streams from various services
extension.description: Livestreamer is a command-line utility that pipes video streams from various services into a video player, such as VLC. The main purpose of Livestreamer is to allow the user to avoid buggy and CPU heavy flash plugins but still be able to enjoy various streamed content. There is also an API available for developers who want access to the video stream data.
extension.license: Simplified BSD

extension.summary: Collection of common tools for addons

extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: MySQL Connector/Python
extension.description: MySQL Connector/Python is implementing the MySQL Client/Server protocol completely in Python. This means you don't have to compile anything or MySQL (client library) doesn't even have to be installed on the machine.
extension.license: GPLv2

extension.summary: Kodi support for PyDev remote debugging in Eclipse/Aptana.
extension.description: See here for details: http://pydev.org/manual_adv_remote_debugger.html
extension.license: Eclipse Public License
extension.disclaimer: Use at your own risk. The authors accept no liability. May cause permanent and/or catastrophic damage. Side effects include, but are not limited to, loss of memory, seizures, sudden fits of rage, sudden fits of melancholy, inability to recall prominent capital cities, lack of respect for authority, fear of cats, temporary and/or permanent black outs. Avoid inhalation. Use in a well ventilated space. Keep away from small children.

extension.summary: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.
extension.description: Six is a Python 2 and 3 compatibility library. It provides utility functions for smoothing over the differences between the Python versions with the goal of writing Python code that is compatible on both Python versions. See the documentation for more information on what is provided.
extension.license: MIT

extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.

extension.summary: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction
extension.description: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction for hundreds of sites. Version is based on youtube-dl date version: YY.MDD.V where V is the addon specific sub-version. Also provides downloading with the option for background downloading with a queue and queue manager.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: OpenVPN addon for XBMC.
extension.description: This addon allows you to set up a number of OpenVPN configurations, which you can then run from XBMC. For more information on setting up this addon see http://brianhornsby.com/xbmc_plugins/openvpn

Umożliwia zabezpieczenie zawartości Kodi przy pomocy kodu PIN.
Proteger o Conteúdo do Kodi com um Código Pin
extension.description: Принуждава потребителите да въвеждат определен PIN код за да им бъде предоставен достъп до посочено съдържание.
Von Anwendern die Eingabe der korrekten PIN für den angegebenen Inhalt erzwingen.
Force users to enter the correct pin code for given content.
Force users to enter the correct pin code for given content.
Force les utilisateurs à saisir le bon code PIN pour un contenu donné.
Forcer les utilisateurs à saisir le bon NIP pour un contenu donné.
특정 콘텐츠에서 PIN 코드 입력을 요구합니다.

Forceer gebruikers een geldige PIN in te voeren voor gegeven content.
Wymusza na użytkownikach wprowadzenie poprawnego kodu PIN, przez uzyskaniem dostępu do danej zawartości.
Força o usuário a entrar o código Pin correto para lhe dar acesso aos conteúdos.

extension.news: New features for skinners including context menu in management dialog, icon override and build improvements. New features for users including ability to disable a menu item and Krypton fixes.
extension.description: Добавка за облици, която осигурява просто управление и списък с потребителски преки пътища (изисква поддръжка от облика)

Πρόσθετο για κελύφη, το οποίο παρέχει έναν απλό τρόπο διαχείρισης και κατηγοριοποίησης των συντομεύσεων του χρήστη (πρέπει να υποστηρίζεται από το κέλυφος)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Complemento para las pieles para proporcionar una gestión sencilla y lista de atajos de usuario (requiere que la piel lo soporte)
Addiciel pour habillages qui fournit une gestion simple et un listage des raccourcis utilisateurs (exige la prise en charge de l'habillage)
Complemento que fornece aos temas dunha xestión sinxela dos atallos dos usuarios (require soporte do tema)
Dodatak za presvlake koja omogućava jednostavno upravljanje i prikaz korisnikovih prečaca (zahtijeva podršku presvlake)
Felszín kiegészítő amely könnyen kezelhetővé és listázhatóvá teszi a felhasználói parancsikonokat (Felszín támogatás szükséges)
Viðbót fyrir viðmót til að halda utan um flýtivísa og fá yfirlit yfir þá (þarfnast stuðnings frá viðmóti)
Add-on per gli skin per consentire un facile gestione ed elenco delle scorciatoie utente (richiede che lo skin lo supporti)
Priedas teminėms išvaizdoms, kad jos turėtų galimybę paprastai tvarkyti ir atvaizduoti vartotojo sukurtas nuorodas (reikalingas teminės išvaizdos palaikymas)
Add-on voor skins om te voorzien in het eenvoudig beheren en sorteren van gebruikers snelkoppelingen (vereist skin ondersteuning)
Tillegg for enkel administrering og opplisting av bruker-snarveier i tema (krever støtte i tema)
Wtyczka dla skór, która zapewnia proste zarządzanie i tworzenie list skrótów użytkownika (wymaga wsparcia skóry)
Um add-on que permite que os temas tenham recursos simples para gerir e listar atalhos de utilizadores (é necessário suporte do tema)
Add-on para que as skins possam prover gerenciamento de lista de atalhos para o menu principal (requer suporte da skin)
Дополнение для обложек, предоставляющее простой способ управления и список пользовательских ярлыков (требуется поддержка обложкой)
Skinntillägg som tillhandahåller enkel hantering och översikt av användargenvägar (om skinnet stöder det)
插件为皮肤提供了简单的管理和用户连接方式列表 (需要皮肤支持)
extension.license: GNU General Public License, v2

extension.summary: Thumbnails Cleaner allows you to clean the thumbnails folder of your Kodi
Thumbnails Cleaner consente di pulire la cartella thumbnails del tuo Kodi
extension.description: Thumbnails Cleaner works for exclusion. The script read the databases and excludes the images found. Once completed, the images will be moved to the destination folder you choose. It is also possible to completely delete the images without moving them. In case of simulation, the images will be copied.

Thumbnails Cleaner lavora per esclusione. Lo script legge i database ed esclude le immagini trovate. Una volta completato, le immagini verranno spostate nella cartella di destinazione scelta. E' anche possibile cancellare completamente le immagini senza spostarle. In caso di simulazione, le immagini verranno copiate.
extension.disclaimer: Thumbnails Cleaner works only with Frodo and later
Thumbnails Cleaner funziona solo con Frodo e successivi

extension.summary: Configure and manage VPN connections using openVPN
extension.description: Establish a connection to a VPN provider and automatically switch VPN locations based on the add-on being used. Also supports automatic reconnect and connection at boot time. And with some simple configuring (see README and remote.xml file in add-on directory), you can cycle through VPN connections using a remote button.
